TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReleaseAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: This attribute indicates that the return value of a function is retained (the caller obtains a reference to the object returned).

remarks.para: The Xamarin.iOS runtime uses this attribute to determine the reference counting behavior on the boundary between Objective-C and managed code.
In this example Xamarin.iOS will first call 'release' on the object returned by [NSUrl clone] (the call to base.Clone), then call 'retain' as the object is returned to Objective-C.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Release attribute.
